channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- MicroLogix 1100 & 1400 Controllers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- MicroLogix 1100 & 1400 Controllers

item.title: CVE-2022-46670|2024-08-03T14:39:38.680Z -- rockwell%20automation -- micrologix%201100%20%26%201400%20controllers
item.description: Rockwell Automation was made aware of a vulnerability by a security researcher from Georgia Institute of Technology that the MicroLogix 1100 and 1400 controllers contain a vulnerability that may give an attacker the ability to accomplish remote code execution. The vulnerability is an unauthenticated stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the embedded webserver. The payload is transferred to the controller over SNMP and is rendered on the homepage of the embedded website.
